help-file.title: "MINOR CREATION"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <object> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Permanent Type of spell: Summoning
This is a very handy spell, allowing the caster to create items such as barrels, lanterns, paper, bags, etc. on the spot. It also allows the caster to create most "newbie" items that players start out with.
